body.p:
Covington Octr 3th 1865
To his Excellency
Governor Bramlette

Chales B Metchell who was at our present court Convicted of an alledged crime and sentenced to the Penatentia for five years he is a young man as I understand of good Family and never before charged with any offence many believe he was not guily of the offence charged he has a young wife here as I am told and Most of the Jury signed his petition for his pardon & It is believed he is a proper case for Execatve Clemency and
from all that I can Learn It would give general satisfaction for your Honor to pardon him

His Excellency
Governor Bramlette
Frankfort
Kentucky
